title: Quarterly average daily rate of hotels in San Francisco 2016 to 2017
summary: The statistic shows the Quarterly average daily rate of hotels in San Francisco 2016 and 2017 .
In the first Quarter of 2017 , the average daily rate of hotels in San Francisco the country was 338 U.S. dollars .

Accommodation in San Francisco - additional information The average daily rate of hotels in San Francisco appears to be much higher in the fourth Quarter of the year , reaching 324 U.S. dollars in 2016 .
